entry.title: WIND WARNING , Vauxhall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vauxhall AAFC 3:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: WSW 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 80 gusting to 100 late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind west 80 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
